description: Convert Data objects into Messages using any {field_name} from input data.

inputs.name: data
inputs.info: The data to convert to text.

inputs.name: template
inputs.info: The template to use for formatting the data. It can contain the keys {text}, {data} or any other key in the Data.

outputs.name: text
outputs.info: Data as a single Message, with each input Data separated by Separator

outputs.name: data_list
outputs.info: Data as a list of new Data, each having `text` formatted by Template
